sentences.chinese: 我們在《星際迷航》中，哇塞。

sentences.english: Zicci: Wow, I didn't expect that you should know so much about her.
sentences.chinese: 哇塞，我沒想到你竟然對她瞭解這麼多。

sentences.english: Heck, call more than 100 things “100 things” if it makes you happy.
sentences.chinese: 哇塞，要是這“100件事”讓你開心話再多做點吧。
